name: Minor Creation
text:
You create a nonmagical, unattended object of nonliving vegetable matter. The volume of the item created cannot exceed 1 cubic foot per caster level. You must succeed on an appropriate Craft skill check to make a complex item.

Attempting to use any created object as a material component causes the spell to fail.
component_text: V, S, M (a tiny piece of matter of the same sort of item you plan to create with minor creation)

effects.text: unattended, nonmagical object of nonliving plant matter, up to 1 cu. ft./level
effects.name: Effect

components.text: a tiny piece of matter of the same sort of item you plan to create with minor creation
